title: Cool Script
content:
Most of the scripts I have look like Wedding fonts. Any idea what this is ( "Good Sense" )

- or something like it??

many thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [948735720881\_HIJcqLr4\_l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/typophile.com/files/948735720881_HIJcqLr4_l.jpg) | 62.18 KB |
author: scarchord

comments.content:
Awesome! thanks for that!

Any recommendations for similar typefaces?

You're welcome.

Sorry, I don't do similars very well.

What you call “wedding fonts” are usually referred to as “formal scripts”. Look for “casual scripts” or “brush scripts” such as [FF Masala Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/https:/www.fontfont.com/fonts/masala-script?aid=2), [FF Market](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/https:/www.fontfont.com/fonts/market?aid=2), [Signalist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mika-melvas/signalist/?refby=typographica), [Hipster Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/hipster-script-pro/?refby=typographica), [House Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts), [Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/underware/bello/?refby=typographica), [Filmotype Lucky](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/lucky/?refby=typographica), and [Coffee Service](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/coffee-service/?refby=typographica).
